attributes.action: Scrap the TV licence fee for everyone.
attributes.additional_details: Get rid of the licence fee and make the BBC find another way to fund itself
attributes.background: Its unfair that the British public are forced to fund the BBC through a licence fee when so many people are struggling in the current economic climate.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Revoke the TV licence at the end of 2027: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606528

End the TV licence and sell the BBC: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614239
